---
title: Get Flow Status
slug: /guides/staking-api/solana/transfer/get-flow-status-transferred
pagination_next: null
---

To get the current state of the existing flow, send a `GET` request to `/api/v1/flows/[:flow_id]` using the flow ID from the previous step.

### Parameters

- None

#### Sample cURL Request

```bash
curl -X GET 'https://solana-slate.datahub.figment.io/api/v1/flows/b45f40d1-051a-41fe-907f-a9b73a55b54e' \
-H 'Authorization: <api_key>'
```

### Response

- `state` &mdash; `string` The current state of the flow.

:::info note

The `state` field will update from `transfer_tx_broadcasting` to `transferred`.

:::

#### Sample Response

```json {3}
{
  "id": "b45f40d1-051a-41fe-907f-a9b73a55b54e",
  "state": "transferred",
  "actions": [],
  "data": {
    "from_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "to_account_pubkey": "9c8oxENj8XrEM2EMadxUoifZgB1Vbc8GEYqKTxTfPo3i",
    "amount": "1.0",
    "funding_account_pubkey": "Hk5voGB7wh9HtXTeszbW7AFm3A4B94xWkXeeaqTYspqy",
    "transfer_transaction": {
      "raw": "",
      "signing_payload": "",
      "signed": "",
      "hash": "zaaAQtDB4oQuX8MSW9wExZxgm8QAk64fxgsyYV6ZPskWtdHtdQYT8vmuwKdqRyoVfecm8EsAC4XQ3eczjXbzX17",
      "status": "confirmed",
      "error": null,
      "signatures": []
    }
  },
  "network_code": "solana",
  "chain_code": "testnet",
  "created_at": "2022-10-04T17:27:16.158Z",
  "updated_at": "2022-10-04T17:35:21.643Z"
}
```

### Token Transfer Flow Complete

Congratulations, you have successfully transferred your tokens!
